attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Sir,
We Have been told that Britain is the worlds 4th best Economy. We cannot finance the Police, Armed Forces, NHS and DHSS. I have had a stroke and can no longer work. I am paid after paying National Insurance for 46 years something laughingly called,"Incapacity Benefit" This will not even keep a sparrow alive. Why is this?

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not simply your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
